comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: From books.google.com/books?id=EEwfAQAAMAAJ&pg=RA15-PA18&a... Advertising and selling, Volume 28, Dec 21, 1918 Charles W Danziger has been elected secretary of the Newspaper Printing Company, publishers of The Pittsburgh Gazette Times and The Pittsburgh Chronicle Telegraph. Mr Danziger has been with this company since the consolidation of The Pittsburgh Times and the Pittsburgh Gazette in 1906. Prior to that time Mr Danziger was managing editor of the Pittsburgh Times and city editor of the Daily News. Before enteing the Pittsburgh newspaper field he was associated with different newspapers in Ohio. In addition to his new position he is also Directing Managing Editor of the Pittsburgh Gazette-Times and The Pittsburgh Chronicle-Telegraph and Secretary of the Tri-State News Bureau. Tentative identification only.
